title: listEvery
name: listEvery
description: This function calls a given closure/function with every element in a given string list and returns true, if all of the closure calls returns true.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any value, numeric index, string list, string delimiter):boolean].

arguments.name: delimiter
arguments.description: delimiter used to separate the string list

arguments.name: multiCharacterDelimiter
arguments.description: specifying whether the delimiters parameter specifies a multi-character delimiter. If this parameter is true, the delimiters parameter must specify a single delimiter consisting of multiple characters. This parameter enables the ListToArray function to convert a list such as the following to an array of color names: red:|orange:|yellow:|green:|blue:|indigo:|violet.

arguments.name: maxThreads
arguments.description: maximum number of threads executed, ignored when argument "parallel" is set to false
